numlitem.para: Associated N1, N2, and EPR indications are operative, and
Main tank fuel quantity indicators are operative.

operation.para: In case of en route failure of the FMC calculated total fuel quantity, flight crew must keep a fuel log for the remainder of the flight.

note.para: The PROGRESS page 1 display of FUEL quantity and time at the last waypoint prior to failure may be used as a starting point.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "L (R) FUEL FLOW INDICATION INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
